ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would highly recommend this course to other students as a stimulating way to understand the varying perspectives on the American Century and the varying ways in which such subject matter may be interpreted.

Yes, if he or she is committed to putting in the effort to read a full book each week. It is also extremely important to be very interested in cultural history and historiography about 20th c. America.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I enjoyed deepening my knowledge about this specific period of American history by examining it from the diverse perspectives presented in discussions and readings. I hope to continue to draw from what I have learned in this course, and I feel that it has allowed me to understand contemporary American history in new ways.
As I hope to explore the intersection between politics and culture in 20th c. American culture, this class was extremely important in providing me a base for my research.
